This is really misleading.  Dogecoin is merge-mined, so the marginal cost to attack it is _zero_; attacking Monero is much more expensive than that.  Prior example: Coiled Coin was merge-mined, and years ago one person with no budget 51% attacked it, killing the coin.  https://t.co/ksnxF6jPyr
